actions.name: BatchDeleteBuilds
actions.description: Deletes one or more builds

actions.name: BatchGetBuildBatches
actions.description: Gets information about one or more build batches

actions.name: BatchGetBuilds
actions.description: Gets information about one or more builds

actions.name: BatchGetProjects
actions.description: Gets information about one or more build projects

actions.name: BatchGetReportGroups
actions.description: Returns an array of ReportGroup objects that are specified by the input reportGroupArns parameter

actions.name: BatchGetReports
actions.description: Returns an array of the Report objects specified by the input reportArns parameter

actions.name: BatchPutCodeCoverages
actions.description: Adds or updates information about a report

actions.name: BatchPutTestCases
actions.description: Adds or updates information about a report

actions.name: CreateProject
actions.description: Creates a build project

actions.name: CreateReport
actions.description: Creates a report. A report is created when tests specified in the buildspec file for a report groups run during the build of a project

actions.name: CreateReportGroup
actions.description: Creates a report group

actions.name: CreateWebhook
actions.description: For an existing AWS CodeBuild build project that has its source code stored in a GitHub or Bitbucket repository, enables AWS CodeBuild to start rebuilding the source code every time a code change is pushed to the repository

actions.name: DeleteBuildBatch
actions.description: Deletes a build batch

actions.name: DeleteOAuthToken
actions.description: Deletes an OAuth token from a connected third-party OAuth provider. Only used in the AWS CodeBuild console

actions.name: DeleteProject
actions.description: Deletes a build project

actions.name: DeleteReport
actions.description: Deletes a report

actions.name: DeleteReportGroup
actions.description: Deletes a report group

actions.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
actions.description: Deletes a resource policy for the associated project or report group

actions.name: DeleteSourceCredentials
actions.description: Deletes a set of GitHub, GitHub Enterprise, or Bitbucket source credentials

actions.name: DeleteWebhook
actions.description: For an existing AWS CodeBuild build project that has its source code stored in a GitHub or Bitbucket repository, stops AWS CodeBuild from rebuilding the source code every time a code change is pushed to the repository

actions.name: DescribeCodeCoverages
actions.description: Returns an array of CodeCoverage objects

actions.name: DescribeTestCases
actions.description: Returns an array of TestCase objects

actions.name: GetReportGroupTrend
actions.description: Analyzes and accumulates test report values for the test reports in the specified report group

actions.name: GetResourcePolicy
actions.description: Returns a resource policy for the specified project or report group

actions.name: ImportSourceCredentials
actions.description: Imports the source repository credentials for an AWS CodeBuild project that has its source code stored in a GitHub, GitHub Enterprise, or Bitbucket repository

actions.name: InvalidateProjectCache
actions.description: Resets the cache for a project

actions.name: ListBuildBatches
actions.description: Gets a list of build batch IDs, with each build batch ID representing a single build batch

actions.name: ListBuildBatchesForProject
actions.description: Gets a list of build batch IDs for the specified build project, with each build batch ID representing a single build batch

actions.name: ListBuilds
actions.description: Gets a list of build IDs, with each build ID representing a single build

actions.name: ListBuildsForProject
actions.description: Gets a list of build IDs for the specified build project, with each build ID representing a single build

actions.name: ListConnectedOAuthAccounts
actions.description: Lists connected third-party OAuth providers. Only used in the AWS CodeBuild console

actions.name: ListCuratedEnvironmentImages
actions.description: Gets information about Docker images that are managed by AWS CodeBuild

actions.name: ListProjects
actions.description: Gets a list of build project names, with each build project name representing a single build project

actions.name: ListReportGroups
actions.description: Returns a list of report group ARNs. Each report group ARN represents one report group

actions.name: ListReports
actions.description: Returns a list of report ARNs. Each report ARN representing one report

actions.name: ListReportsForReportGroup
actions.description: Returns a list of report ARNs that belong to the specified report group. Each report ARN represents one report

actions.name: ListRepositories
actions.description: Lists source code repositories from a connected third-party OAuth provider. Only used in the AWS CodeBuild console

actions.name: ListSharedProjects
actions.description: Returns a list of project ARNs that have been shared with the requester. Each project ARN represents one project

actions.name: ListSharedReportGroups
actions.description: Returns a list of report group ARNs that have been shared with the requester. Each report group ARN represents one report group

actions.name: ListSourceCredentials
actions.description: Returns a list of SourceCredentialsInfo objects

actions.name: PersistOAuthToken
actions.description: Saves an OAuth token from a connected third-party OAuth provider. Only used in the AWS CodeBuild console

actions.name: PutResourcePolicy
actions.description: Creates a resource policy for the associated project or report group

actions.name: RetryBuild
actions.description: Retries a build

actions.name: RetryBuildBatch
actions.description: Retries a build batch

actions.name: StartBuild
actions.description: Starts running a build

actions.name: StartBuildBatch
actions.description: Starts running a build batch

actions.name: StopBuild
actions.description: Attempts to stop running a build

actions.name: StopBuildBatch
actions.description: Attempts to stop running a build batch

actions.name: UpdateProject
actions.description: Changes the settings of an existing build project

actions.name: UpdateProjectVisibility
actions.description: Changes the public visibility of a project and its builds

actions.name: UpdateReport
actions.description: Updates information about a report

actions.name: UpdateReportGroup
actions.description: Changes the settings of an existing report group

actions.name: UpdateWebhook
actions.description: Updates the webhook associated with an AWS CodeBuild build project
